analysis.description:

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/27/0x86ad220d9fee817847f03876986e6626f676b7cb.sol#328:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/27/0x86ad220d9fee817847f03876986e6626f676b7cb.sol:
